section.title: Release Transfer Orders by Agent
section.para: To release transfer orders by Agent, select the "Release Transfer Orders by Agent" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Release Transfer Orders by Agent Code

section.para: When releasing transfer orders by Agent, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to release transfer orders for all Agents.
Specify Agent whose transfer orders you want to release.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Releases the transfer orders by Agent.
